Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
- Damage reduction rate 70%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For 5 turns from the character's entry turn*
- Guards all attacks
*Starting from the 6th turn from the character's entry turn*
- Great chance of guarding all attacks
*When 4 or more Extreme Class allies are on the team, or
when there is another "Movie Heroes" or "Movie Bosses"
Category ally attacking in the same turn*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*For every attack received*
- ATK 150%{passiveImg:up_g} and chance of performing a critical hit 10%{passiveImg:up_g}
within the turn
*Whenever guard is activated*
- {passiveImg:forever}DEF 20%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 100%)
*When 3 or more Super Class allies are on the team starting
from the 3rd turn from the character's entry turn, or starting
from the 5th turn from the start of battle*
- {passiveImg:once}Changes Ki Spheres: AGL & STR to TEQ
- {passiveImg:once}Randomly changes PHY or INT Ki Spheres to
Rainbow Ki Spheres
- Meets up with Gogeta and can perform Reversible Exchange

7974.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK & DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7975.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers ATK & DEF; 
raises allies' ATK by 50% for 1 turn 
(self excluded)

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Golden Frieza's Pride
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Ki +24, DEF +400% and directs enemy's 
attack towards the character for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there are 4 or more 
Extreme Class allies on the team (once only, 
be it before or after Reversible Exchange)
